question: How are eligibility results determined?
text:
How are eligibility results determined?
          
        
Your eligibility results are determined by the information you include on your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace application, including:


The number of individuals in your household,




Who is seeking coverage,




Your household income,




The county in which you live,




Whether you are a Virginia resident




Your citizenship or immigration status




Whether you have other
qualifying health coverage



If you received a healthcare premium tax credit in the past and did not reconcile the amount when you filed your taxes, this can make you ineligible for future tax credits. Please refer to
this FAQ
for information on how to reconcile your premium tax credit.
See
this FAQ
for information on what to do if you think your eligibility results are incorrect.
